name: Pong 3D (Y33)
description:
Pong 3D is a simple game of pong but in 3D. The game has three difficulty settings. Play and show your highest score in the comments section!

Control

W A S D - Move

Known Issues
- The ball can end up in a boring loop of death.
- If the speed is too high it might not trigger the goal. Reset the game if that occurs.
